title: Sorry OLED TV fans – big sizes won't get much cheaper any time soon
description: LG Display has delayed its next-gen OLED manufacturing plans yet again, which are aimed at making bigger and cheaper TV panels.

title: DDoS attacks are getting more complex and harder to spot
description: Hackers are running raids during holidays, report warns.

title: You can now buy Dyson’s Bane-like air filtering headphones, but should you?
description: It looks like Dyson wasn’t blowing hot air when it said it was getting into wearables and audio, with its air purifying headphones now available in the US.

title: Redfall threatens to guzzle 32GB of RAM on PC – but don’t panic
description: Noticed the trend of cutting-edge games requiring 32GB of system memory? Do you really need that much RAM?

title: Microsoft’s plan to win over Bard users to Bing AI could backfire
description: In another sketchy move, Microsoft is nudging those visiting Bard in the Edge browser to try Bing AI instead.

title: The latest Oculus Quest 2 update is here to speed up your game downloads
description: The v53 Oculus Quest 2 and Meta Quest Pro update is here with speedier downloads, stereo audio recording, and browser content filters.

title: Microsoft powers-up AI in free design app
description: Microsoft unveils new AI tools and Edge integration for free Designer online design app.

title: PSVR 2 retail availability won't be enough to address its sales woes
description: PSVR 2 is coming to a retailer near you, but chances are you still won't be buying.

title: Microsoft is turning to Rust to safeguard some of its most crucial core code
description: Rust promises a more secure Windows, but the team of developers is already looking beyond Rust.

title: BeReal's policy update isn't really fixing its privacy issues
description: BeReal is a compelling social media app, but like almost every other it also appears to be harvest every drop of its users' data.

title: ChatGPT's new virtual assistant has freaked me out
description: A new virtual assistant named 'Annie' could be your intimate connection to ChatGPT... but it's a bit creepy.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (April 28)
description: From brand new Prime Video thrillers to returning Netflix dramas, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: Crypto wallets are being hit by a new Mac infostealer
description: A new piece of malware targeting MacOS can steal passwords, files, card info and crypto wallet data.

title: Google blocked thousands of developer accounts to stop malware
description: Google also banned millions of Android apps and addressed countless privacy violations.

title: Apple fans beware - Mac and iOS devices are facing more security threats than ever before
description: The number of hackers targeting Apple devices with cryptominers is on the rise, report finds.

title: Siri is being left behind – and Apple knows it
description: A new report suggests Apple employees have grown frustrated by the stagnation of Siri.

title: Chromebooks just got a video editor that takes all the hassle out of movie making
description: Google Photos takes center stage in this new feature that can automatically put together movies for you.

title: Microsoft is back on the offensive, signing yet another 10-year deal for cloud gaming
description: Microsoft signs another 10-year deal for a cloud gaming partnership days after the CMA blocked its acquisition.

title: Microsoft is ditching hundreds of mice, keyboards and webcams to focus on Surface
description: Surface-branded accessories will soon be your only option - so grab those cheaper Microsoft ones now before supplies run out.

title: Leaked Google Pixel 7a render shows a stunning orange color
description: Google could be selling four Pixel colors for the first time in a while.

title: A new EU bill aimed at ChatGPT could give creatives more power over their work
description: ChatGPT could face regulation as the EU proposes a new bill that demands public disclosure of the AI's training materials.

title: Hate widgets? Then you won’t like what Microsoft is up to in latest Windows 11 preview
description: Microsoft is angling for widgets to play a larger part in Windows 11 – but it’s treading carefully.

title: Your Microsoft Teams calls should actually sound quite good soon
description: Microsoft Teams is seeing a spatial audio upgrade.

title: AWS earnings and sales soar once again, but Amazon warns of potential cloud slowdown
description: A considerable boost to net sales is met with increased operational costs as AWS continues to battle a tough economy.

title: The Sony Xperia 1 V has a confirmed launch date and a "next-gen" camera
description: Sony has confirmed that it will be launching the Xperia 1 V in May, very close to when we're expecting new Pixel phones.

title: I never knew I needed a wicker Bluetooth speaker ‘til I saw B&O’s 60’s-styled beauty
description: Bang & Olufsen wants us to think of straw Panama hats on beaches with its new portable Bluetooth speaker.

title: Can't find something to watch? Google TV just got over 800 channels for free in the US
description: Your Google TV device just got an update that adds over 800 live TV channels that you can watch for free.

title: This password manager wants you to remember 24 words to recover your account
description: Keeper has made the switch from the traditional security question to the system of random words used to lock crypto wallets.

title: Respawn is committed to debugging Star Wars Jedi: Survivor, starting with this
description: Respawn has added one crucial feature that may help players get over a critical fear.

title: AMD Ryzen 7000 chips will no longer randomly burn out – but there’s a cost
description: AMD’s latest firmware update has fixed an issue that caused some chips to perish, but it’s come at a cost for overclockers.

title: Telegram banned in Brazil for failing to hand over data of neo-Nazi chats
description: While an interest in VPN services is rising among Brazilians, Telegram plans to appeal the judge's decision in court.

title: Microsoft putting Windows 10 on life support won’t push me to Windows 11
description: Microsoft downs tools on Windows 10 – it'll be security updates only from now on, with no new features coming.

title: Dropbox blames AI as it lays off hundreds of workers
description: AI-related layoffs got rid of more workers than economy-related layoffs: is this a trend that will continue?

title: Keep your business emails protected with these top tips
description: Emails can be an easy way for attackers to hit your business, but we've got some hints to help.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Friday, April 28 (game #459)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Ring's new Indoor Cam model adds small yet important change to flagship series
description: In its second generation revamp, the Indoor Cam now has a shutter to automatically stop recordings.
